Class Edge<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataStructures.Edge<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - The edge type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Edge<E>>

    public class Edge<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Edge<E>>
    This class represents an edge of a graph.
    Author:
    JuanchoVelezPro
